entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Wawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -15.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 2:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: -15.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 51 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -23.7°C
Wind: NE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. A few flurries beginning early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:20 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:20 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:20 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 17. Forecast issued 11:20 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
